name: Pheasant Pharm Phrenzy (LGJ 2022)
description:
Collect eggs to earn money!

Keep your pheasants well fed and hydrated for increased egg production, place nests to hatch new (and rare) pheasants.

Don't forget to pay your taxes!

WASD to move, SPACE to place nests

Source code: https://github.com/avahe-kellenberger/pheasantfarm
